main event: Reliable observers reported seeing two rotating white lights at Stewart AFB, New York, on April 4, 1954.
interesting points: The lights were observed for about 15 to 20 minutes,They were seen at an altitude of 20,000 to 30,000 feet,Additional witnesses also reported the sighting later at 0015,The lights appeared to be descending and were described as having no discernible features or sound,The report suggests the objects could possibly be balloons.
